title: The Deathliest Fighter
author: Sean Monahan
description: Local multiplayer arena combat for 2 to 4 people on Mac and Windows.
headline: The Deathliest Fighter

downloads.headline: Download Now For Mac and Windows

controls.headline: How To Play
controls.padCopy: Connect up to four gamepads to your Mac or PC.
controls.keyboardCopy: Up to two players can play on a single keyboard.
